title: Loving Hut - Celje
typeOfFood: Vegan, Organic, Western, Fast food, Asian
description: Part of international chain of vegan restaurants opened by followers of Supreme Master Ching Hai, an advocate for vegetarian living. Each location is individual family owned and operated. Serves all vegan food, coffee, non-alcoholic beverages, and more. Veggie kebabs, spring rolls, rice dishes, noodles, goulash, soups, desserts.
